Text:
Thanks :)

Some time ago a smaller version of this game (90 MB) was released; do you know what the differences are between that one and yours? Maybe the sound tracks?

I don't know... It could be a rip without the soundtrack.
Btw I can't upload all the time, and my upload isn't very good.

The 90mb rip had no sound, just a few, like rain and stuff...

There were no speech and no music, so that rip sucks ...
Thanks you so much for this one!

Bah, får bara ett fel medelande när jag ska installera... Vet någon vad jag kan/ska göra åt det? 

"16-bitars Windows-undersystem"

C:WINDOWSSYSTEM32AUTOEXEC.NT. Systemfilen är inte lämplig för att köra DOS- och Microsoft Windows-program. Välj Stäng för att avsluta programmet.

Något irriterande efter att man har haft en massa problem med att få ner den också... Jaja, hjälp skulle uppskatas...


Anyone know what I should do about this error message I get when I try and instal? Translated from swedish it goes something like this:

"16-bits Windows-undersystem"

C:WINDOWSSYSTEM32AUTOEXEC.NT. The systemfile is not appropiete to run in DOS- and Microsoft Windows-programs. Choose Close to quit the program.

Any help would be appreciated

Try running it under DOSBox... find it at dosbox.sourceforge.net/
There is a nice front-end for this application called D-Fend, you will find a link to it there. It works wonders.
